alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 05 at 6:12AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Freezing drizzle will affect Northeastern Whiteside...Jo daviess...Carroll...Stephenson...Jackson...Dubuque...Northeastern Jones...Delaware and Northeastern Clinton counties through 815 AM CST... At 611 AM CST, an area of freezing drizzle was located along a line extending from near Luxemburg to near Elmoville. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Freezing drizzle. SOURCE...Observations and spotter reports. IMPACTS...Slick surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Freeport, Manchester, Galena, Mount Carroll, Asbury, Dyersville, Savanna, Lena, Bellevue, Cascade, Stockton, Epworth, East Dubuque, Farley, Lanark, Warren, Peosta, Milledgeville, and Fairhaven. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The freezing rain or drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
